MESSAGE: Go to the tree.  Press SPACEBAR or click ACTION to chop 4 logs.
Press SPACEBAR or click ACTION to make planks.
Walk to the river then press SPACEBAR or ACTION to craft a bridge!
A W E S O M E !
This game took AGES to make...📆
Ok, free jokes coming up.  No extra charge.
